con:request.name: create script instance
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         	<createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.CounterPeriodScript_${#TestSuite#ticket}">
            <type>JAVA</type>
            <script>
            <![CDATA[
			package org.meveo.service.script;			
			import java.util.Map;
			import java.math.BigDecimal;
			import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
			import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
			import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
			import org.meveo.model.BusinessEntity;
			import org.slf4j.Logger;
			import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
			public class CounterPeriodScript_${#TestSuite#ticket} extends Script {
			  	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CounterPeriodScript_${#TestSuite#ticket}.class);
				public void execute(Map<String,Object> context, User user) throws BusinessException{
					log.debug("CounterPeriodScript_${#TestSuite#ticket} called");
				    }
			}
		   ]]>
            </script>
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Rating sript
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         	<createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.SampleRatingScript" description="SampleRatingScript">
            <type>JAVA</type>
            <script>
            <![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.Iterator;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.Map.Entry;
import java.util.Set;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.billing.WalletOperation;
import org.meveo.service.script.Script;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class SampleRatingScript extends Script {

	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(SampleRatingScript.class);
	
	@Override
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> methodContext, User user) throws BusinessException {
		log.debug("EXECUTE  methodContext {}, User {} ", methodContext, user);
		try {
			WalletOperation wo = (WalletOperation) methodContext.get(Script.CONTEXT_ENTITY);
			BigDecimal quantity = wo.getQuantity();
			log.debug("Execute quantity:" + quantity);			

			wo.setAmountWithoutTax(new BigDecimal(120));
			wo.setUnitAmountWithoutTax(new BigDecimal(10));
			wo.setQuantity(new BigDecimal("12"));
			log.debug("wo.getAmountWithoutTax():" + wo.getAmountWithoutTax());
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}

	
}
]]>
            </script>
            <executionRoles name="administrateur"></executionRoles>
            <sourcingRoles name="administrateur"> </sourcingRoles>            
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create Module
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <module code="CustomInvoiceXmlModule" license="GPL" description="Custom Invoice Xml Module">          
            <!--Optional:-->
            <moduleItems>

               <script code="org.meveo.service.script.InvoiceXmlScript" description="Custom Invoice Xml Script">
                  <!--Optional:-->
                  <type>JAVA</type>
                  <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.io.File;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.math.RoundingMode;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

import javax.persistence.Query;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.admin.Seller;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.billing.BillingAccount;
import org.meveo.model.billing.Invoice;
import org.meveo.model.billing.RatedTransaction;
import org.meveo.model.order.Order;
import org.meveo.service.billing.impl.BillingAccountService;
import org.meveo.service.billing.impl.RatedTransactionService;
import org.meveo.service.billing.impl.XMLInvoiceCreator;
import org.meveo.service.crm.impl.CustomFieldInstanceService;
import org.meveo.service.script.Script;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
import org.w3c.dom.Document;
import org.w3c.dom.Element;

/**
 * 
 * @author anasseh
 *
 *         Generate custom Xml Invoice
 * 
 *         Execute Context Variable : 
 *         <li>CONTEXT_ENTITY : the invoice
 *         <li>isVirtual : invoicing mode
 *         <li>XMLInvoiceCreator : XMLInvoiceCreator std service
 * 
 * 
 */
public class InvoiceXmlScript extends org.meveo.service.script.Script {

	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(InvoiceXmlScript.class);
	private RatedTransactionService ratedTransactionService = (RatedTransactionService) getServiceInterface("RatedTransactionService");
	private BillingAccountService billingAccountService = (BillingAccountService) getServiceInterface("BillingAccountService");
	private CustomFieldInstanceService cfiService = (CustomFieldInstanceService) getServiceInterface("CustomFieldInstanceService");

	@Override
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> methodContext, User user) throws BusinessException {
		log.debug("EXECUTE  methodContext {}, User {}", methodContext, user);
		try{
			XMLInvoiceCreator xmlInvoiceCreator = (XMLInvoiceCreator) methodContext.get("XMLInvoiceCreator");
			Invoice invoice = (Invoice) methodContext.get(Script.CONTEXT_ENTITY);
			Boolean isVirtual = (Boolean) methodContext.get("isVirtual");
			int rounding = user.getProvider().getRounding() == null ? 2 : user.getProvider().getRounding();
			Document document = xmlInvoiceCreator.createDocument(invoice,isVirtual.booleanValue());
			Element commsTag = document.createElement("commissions");
			for(Order order : invoice.getOrders()){				
				Element commTag = document.createElement("commission");
				commTag.setAttribute("orderNum", order.getCode());
				commTag.setAttribute("commRate","10.0" );
				commTag.setAttribute("commAmount", "commAmount");
				commTag.setAttribute("commAmountWithoutTax","commAmountWithoutTax" );
				commsTag.appendChild(commTag);
			}
			document.getElementsByTagName("invoice").item(0).appendChild(commsTag);			
			File file = xmlInvoiceCreator.createFile(document,invoice);
			methodContext.put(Script.RESULT_VALUE, file);
		}catch(Exception e){
			throw new BusinessException(e.getMessage());			
		}
	}


	private String round(BigDecimal amount, Integer scale) {
		if (amount == null) {
			amount = BigDecimal.ZERO;
		}
		if (scale == null) {
			scale = 2;
		}
		amount = amount.setScale(scale, RoundingMode.HALF_UP);
		return amount.toPlainString();
	}	
}]]></script>
                  <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->                
               </script>
                <customFieldTemplate code="PROV_CUSTOM_INV_XML_SCRIPT_CODE" description="Custom invoice XML Script code">
                  <fieldType>STRING</fieldType>                  
                  <appliesTo>Provider</appliesTo>
                  <storageType>SINGLE</storageType>
                  <valueRequired>false</valueRequired>                             
                  <cacheValue>true</cacheValue>                  
               </customFieldTemplate>               
            </moduleItems>
         </module>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create recurrent charge
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createRecurringChargeTemplate> <!--Optional:--> <recurringChargeTemplate code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_REC1" description="${#TestSuite#ticket}_REC1"> <invoiceSubCategory>SUB_DATA</invoiceSubCategory> <disabled>false</disabled> <!--Optional:--> <amountEditable>false</amountEditable> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <languageDescriptions> <languageCode>FRA</languageCode> <description>Forfait test ${#ticket}</description> </languageDescriptions> <calendar>MONTHLY</calendar> <subscriptionProrata>true</subscriptionProrata> <terminationProrata>true</terminationProrata> <applyInAdvance>true</applyInAdvance> <inputUnitDescription>unit</inputUnitDescription> <!--Optional:--> <ratingUnitDescription>unit</ratingUnitDescription> <!--Optional:--> <unitMultiplicator>1</unitMultiplicator> <unitNbDecimal>2</unitNbDecimal> </recurringChargeTemplate> </ws:createRecurringChargeTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
